mapper.select: SELECT id, pre_id, course_id, name, type, url, video_type, duration FROM t_video_course_detail WHERE course_id = #{courseId} AND pre_id = 0 ORDER BY id

SELECT dt.id,dt.`name`,dt.duration,count(h.user_id)as totalCount FROM t_video_history h LEFT JOIN t_video_course_detail dt ON dt.id = h.detail_id AND dt.type=1 LEFT JOIN t_video_course c ON h.course_id = c.id WHERE h.meet_id=#{meetId} GROUP BY dt.id
